Description: One of two small pieces of the same quartz crystal vessel: bearing part of an incised inscription on the exterior surface. The break between the two fragments cuts through the text, and parts of some signs are missing. It seems that the vessel was a small cup with concave sides.
Curator's comments: Fragment joins with 1900,1015.28. Bibliography: W. M. F. Petrie, 'Royal Tombs of the Earliest Dynasties' I, 12, 20, pl. VI, 5; F. Legge, ‘Proceedings of the Society of Biblical Archaeology’ 30 (London, 1908), pl. IVe.
